ygData.subject: RE: Running away from everything (Was:RE: Selo's)
ygData.msgSnippet: Your health might have contributed, cause this guy doesn t outrun everything.  I can overtake him pretty handily with 200 percussion and Mistmoore Drums.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Your health might have contributed, 'cause this guy doesn't outrun
everything. I can overtake him pretty handily with 200 percussion and
Mistmoore Drums. I think the only common mobs that can outrun me now are
Shadowmen and perhaps Grimfeather, but if I recall correctly from this list
I'm slightly faster than the uber-Griff now.

Crier

> This guy outruns anything. Could be because he had me to below
> 1/2 health when I started running (in about 2 seconds).
>
> Was pretty funny- glad my friendly neighborhood cleric was there!
>
>
> Previous post:
> --Gaelaian Galaenor, 22nd level bard looking forward to being able to run
> away from everything.
